fields.label: Instructions
fields.message: Banners should be at least 990px wide and approximately a 7:1 ratio. Please contact intranet-support@digital.justice.gov.uk if you need to upload a banner image that is less than 640px high.

fields.label: Check box to turn banner on
fields.name: check_box_to_turn_banner_on

fields.label: Notification
fields.message: Recommended that side banners should be in a 3:2 ratio. Please contact intranet-support@digital.justice.gov.uk if you need to upload a banner image that is less than 640px high.

fields.label: Banner header (optional but won't display without image)
fields.name: banner_sidebar_header
